value.name: SNP calls on Labour to back plans to ban unpaid trial shifts
value.description: An SNP MP and MSP have jointly written to the leadership of the Labour Party asking for support in an attempt to ban unpaid trial shifts. value.name: The runaway Speaker
value.description: It was in December 1982, in the aftermath of the titanic struggle between Tony Benn and Denis Healey for Labour’s deputy leadership, that the party’s left split.
